AllDecks.LandDestruct:
Strategy: Cast lots of wipe cards and bring in on-demand creatures as needed
Lightform (2 WHT devotion) (also works w/ Jeskai charm: "put creature on top of library") Heliod
AllDecks.LivingLore:
Crack the Earth Ojutai's Command
LivingLore (White Blue Red): - Use graveyard-fill cards and Living Lore to get big threat and big spells - Use Eidolon of Great Revel and only 4+ casting cost cards and include lots of lands that can become 3/3 creatures w/ Hammer of Purphoros - Put in lots and lots of Planewalkers and Chain Veils - Need more Ojutai Monuments and other similar non-creatures-that-can-become-creatures
